kickstart.description: Additional packages that may be needed on a server that was not originally built with Rocks. Tested on Native CentOS installed build machine.
kickstart.copyright: Copyright (c) 2000 - 2014 The Regents of the University of California. All rights reserved. Rocks(r) 6.2 www.rocksclusters.org
kickstart.changelog:
$Log: bootstrap-packages.xml,v $ Revision 1.16 2012/10/17 23:18:42 phil Forgot to check in google-otp.xml Additional packages for Bootstrap on CentOS 6.3
Revision 1.15 2012/10/17 05:24:39 phil mysql-devel, httpd-devel
Revision 1.14 2012/10/05 18:37:09 clem yum-utils is needed by rocks-boot to compile
Revision 1.13 2012/10/05 07:35:22 clem src/evk needs eject
Revision 1.12 2012/10/04 21:48:11 clem more bad char in the CVS logs
Revision 1.11 2012/10/04 16:54:26 clem pam devel is needed by google athenticator
Revision 1.10 2012/05/06 05:48:10 phil Copyright Storm for Mamba
Revision 1.9 2012/04/12 21:27:12 phil Some fixes for 5 -- tcl for environment-modules bootstrap
Revision 1.8 2012/04/06 00:15:10 phil More packages for bootstrapping a build
Revision 1.7 2012/03/21 18:42:53 phil Added glibc-static and nspr-devel to support building of new version of firerox
Revision 1.6 2012/01/23 19:50:17 phil Added additional bootstrap packages for 6. syslinux-perl (for 6, doesn't hurt on 5)
Revision 1.5 2011/11/05 04:14:13 phil Packages to build rrdtool, graphviz
Revision 1.4 2011/11/04 18:21:09 phil A few more packages
Revision 1.3 2011/11/04 03:06:35 phil Couple of more files for Non-Rocks build host bootstrap
Revision 1.2 2011/11/03 22:48:15 phil More packages for non-Rocks build system bootstrap
Revision 1.1 2011/11/03 16:32:02 phil Getting closer to functional bootstrap on a non-Rocks build host
